name: Unnamed 7DRL20
description:
Controls
  • WASD - Move/Turn character; Move menu cursor
  • R - Swap mainhand and offhand item
  • Space - Attack
  • Escape - Close menu; Cancel menu
  • Enter - Open menu; Confirm menu
Hints
  • There's no victory condition!
  • Some materials have different effects depending on whether you're building a Blade or an Adze and which part they make up on the tool. Example: Karmesine only provides the Bleeding trait if it's a head or blade.
  • Some tool combinations are quite strong, experiment!
  • If a head/blade looks different for a tool, it will have different attack elements. Example: Basalt makes a butcher blade with 100% slash and 50% bludgeon.
  • Dilithium can be used as a fuel for the smelter if you run out of coal.
  • Your offhand tool will not provide any stats.
  • There are 2 alloys currently in the game:
    • Basalt + Tiberium = Triberium
    • Dilithium + Tiberium = Triberium
    • Karmesine + Ovium + Jauxum = Terrax
  • Enemies will spawn near you every 60 turns. Your starting room is safe.
Credits
  • Check out Tinker's Construct and TAIGA, the 2 Minecraft mods that this game's materials are based on.
